data.detailed_description:

We will sent 25% from our summer profit of selling the game to President's of Ukraine United24 Foundation for rebuild of Ukraine

Let's build not only inside the game but outside too!

About the Game

Multiplayer sandbox where you became a real mechanic. Build everything from the scratch. Make a simple construction or join wheels and engines to build a car then ride it. Build a rocket and fly. Construct a tank to defend yourself.

CREATE
Create anything form scrap just your imagination could invent. Use simple blocs or complex physics simulation. Stand on the pass of engineer.

BETTER TOGETHER
Create or join any server. Defend your base or capture another one. Communicate through the chat or use signs.

BEYOND PLATFORM
Unique save system let you generate many worlds and share them with friends or your mobile device. Just send a save file and continue creating. Blueprints will help you to save or load any construction on the go.

data.short_description: Physics-based cross-play mechanic simulator. Become a real engineer, create new mechanisms and build your worlds. Craft, join & share your creation across PC and mobile devices. Play with your friends beyond one platform.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game suppose to work even on microvawe as it was designed for mobile first
